ack.p: The authors thank the Program for Technological Development in Tools for Health-PDTIS-FIOCRUZ and the Instituto Lêonidas e Maria Deane, for use of its facilities (ILMD sequencing platform), the Coordenação de Aperfeiçoamento de Pessoal de Nível Superior (Capes), and the Governo do Estado de Roraima e Laboratório Central de Saúde Pública do Estado de Roraima (LACEN-RR). The authors also thanks to Dr Vera Bongertz for critical review of the manuscript.
